 url[i]=header+url0+i+url1;
url

ruleFindUrl:
<js>
var D1 = '::', D2 = '&&';
var link = 'https://m.ebtang.com/m/book/booklistJson?page=searchPage&rows=30&bookRoomOrderByType=6&sortType=&tagIds=&bookRoomWordType=-1&bookRoomUpdateType=-1&bookRoomVipType=-1&bookRoomFinishType=-1&randomString={{Date.now()}}';
var jdoc = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(link.replace('searchPage', '1'))));
result = jdoc.categoryList.map(v => v.name + D1 + link.replace(/([?&]sortType=)[^?&]*/, '$1'+v.id));
result.unshift('🔹书库'+D1+link);
result = result.join(D2);
</js>
ruleSearchList:
<js>
var jdoc = JSON.parse(String(result));
result = /[?&]searchName/.test(baseUrl)
  ? jdoc.bookList.filter(v => v.name.includes(jdoc.searchName) || v.authorNick.includes(jdoc.searchName))
  : jdoc.bookList;
</js>
